isFinished

public boolean isFinished()

needsItem

public boolean needsItem(String itemName)
Checks the brewery to see if the given item is part of the recipe

Parameters:
itemName - The name of the item being checked
Returns:
A boolean determining whether or not the item is part of the recipe

throwInItem

public void throwInItem(Item item)
Throw an item into the brewery. It will be lost regardless of whether or not it was required, but will not negatively affect the mixture if it wasn't

Parameters:
item - The item to throw into the brewery
